00022 #ifdef _WIN32
00023 #pragma once
00024 #endif
00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Xml/Serializable.h>
00027 #include <fdo/Commands/Schema/PhysicalElementMapping.h>
00028 
00029 /// \brief
00030 /// FdoPhysicalSchemaMapping is an  abstract class that is the base class of
00031 /// all Schema Override sets. Each instance contains the overrides for a 
00032 /// particular Feature Schema and FDO Provider.
00033 /// Each FDO Provider, that allows Schema Overrides, must create a sub-class of this 
00034 /// class. This sub-class must implement the overrides that are specific to the 
00035 /// provider. The Provider can also add support, for serializing to an XML document, 
00036 /// by overriding the functions inherited from  FdoXmlSerializable.
00037 class FdoPhysicalSchemaMapping :
00038     public FdoPhysicalElementMapping,
00039     public FdoXmlSerializable
00040 {
00041     friend class FdoPhysicalSchemaMappingCollection;
00042  
00043 public:
00044     /// \brief
00045     /// Gets the name of the applicable FDO provider.
00046     /// 
00047     /// \return
00048     /// Returns the name of FDO provider to which this Schema Override set 
00049     /// applies. The provider name must conform to the format:
00050     /// "[Company].[Provider].[Version]".
00051     /// 
00052     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetProvider() = 0;
00053 
00054 protected:
00055     /// \brief
00056     /// Initializes this Schema Override set from its XML attributes. Called when
00057     /// the set is deserialized from XML. This function decodes any
00058     /// encoded schema names (See _writeXml). Can be extended to handle 
00059     /// particular XML attributes for derived classes.
00060     /// 
00061     /// \param pContext 
00062     /// Input context contain information about the current deserialization operation
00063     /// \param attrs 
00064     /// Input the XML attributes.
00065     /// 
00066     /// \return
00067     /// Returns nothing
00068     /// 
00069     FDO_API virtual void InitFromXml(GisXmlSaxContext* pContext, GisXmlAttributeCollection* attrs);
00070 
00071     /// \brief
00072     /// Writes this Schema Override set to XML. Called when
00073     /// this set is serialized to XML. This function converts (encodes) 
00074     /// schema names to be valid XML element names. Can be extended to handle provider-specific
00075     /// attributes and sub-elements.
00076     /// 
00077     /// \param xmlWriter 
00078     /// Input write the Schema Override set to this XML writer
00079     /// \param flags 
00080     /// Input flags that control the writing of the Schema Override set.
00081     /// 
00082     /// \return
00083     /// Returns nothing
00084     /// 
00085     FDO_API virtual void _writeXml(
00086         GisXmlWriter* xmlWriter, 
00087         const FdoXmlFlags* flags
00088     );
00089 
00090 };
00091 
00092 /// \brief
00093 /// FdoIPhysicalSchemaMappingP is a GisPtr on FdoIPhysicalSchemaMapping, provided for convenience.
00094 typedef GisPtr<FdoPhysicalSchemaMapping> FdoPhysicalSchemaMappingP;
00095 
00096 #endif
